entry.title: Dear Mr. Uther Pendragon
entry.summary:
Author: gloriask

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,640Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 1,114

Summary: After a heated argument with his son three years ago, Arthur left home, and Uther hadn’t spoken a single word to him since. That is, until he started receiving some rather peculiar emails.   Now has Merlin's pov. Completed. Updated:Extra Track 1 - Love ConfessionExtra Track 2 - Sentimental Extra Track 3 - The Emails

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 298,238Chapters: 64/100Kudos: 2,973

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: Bitchy
entry.summary:
Author: luvroykent

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,181Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Arthur never thought he would see the day that his court physician prescribed daily orgasms as the solution to his problems. However, here he is. Arthur has carried a secret his entire life. No one but Gaius knows that his intense mood swings are a result of his unique anatomy (modern day PMS, but magnified). Despite many attempts, he can’t seem to control his emotions, threatening his ability to rule. Gaius’s suggestion is his last hope. As he continues his “treatment”, he quickly realizes his desires are growing for a certain manservant. Merlin takes it upon himself to serve his king beyond what the usual servant duties entail. Will they be able to maintain their indifference, or will their indulgence lead to something more?

entry.title: The Dawn of Destiny
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperedPages819

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,886Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Maryana returns to Camelot alive—but survival has a cost. Her escape from captivity leaves the court shaken, the king fearful, and the city bristling with suspicion. Old alliances strain under the weight of secrets, and the laws against magic tighten even as something ancient stirs beyond the castle walls. Hidden within Camelot is a boy the world was never meant to find. His presence bends fate in subtle, dangerous ways—drawing attention from forces that do not yet understand what they have awakened. As Arthur is pulled between loyalty and justice, and Morgana begins to walk a darker, more deliberate path, Maryana is forced to confront a truth she has spent years avoiding: destiny cannot be outrun—only challenged. Because when the old world begins to fracture, the dawn does not arrive gently.And some futures demand to be fought for.

entry.title: Shadows of the Witch
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperedPages819

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 363,019Chapters: 97/97Kudos: 43

Summary: The fragile trust between Arthur and Merilyn is no longer a secret hope—it is real, tangible, and dangerously alive. For the first time, Arthur sees magic not as a weapon, but as part of the woman he loves. Their bond deepens, even as the shadow of destiny presses closer. But love does not erase the weight of prophecy, nor the enemies waiting to tear them apart. Yet the greatest revelation lies not in vengeance, but in blood. Merilyn’s long-buried secret, her son emerges into the light. His existence changes everything: for Merilyn, for Arthur, and for the destiny of Camelot itself. Whispers of the boy ripple through the Old Religion, binding his fate to the same prophecy that foretells Arthur’s rise and Merilyn’s sacrifice. Allies will question her loyalty. Enemies will seek to use him. And Arthur must decide if love can survive the truth that destiny has hidden from them both.

entry.title: Destiny Unfold
entry.summary:
Author: chronic_pain_in_the_ass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,053Chapters: 8/65Kudos: 82

Summary: No young man, no matter how great, or mystic can know his destiny. He cannot glimpse his part in the great story that is about to unfold. Like everyone, he must live and learn. And so, it will be for the young magic arriving at the gates of Camelot. A boy that will, in time, father the legend. His name: Merlin.OrA rewrite of Merlin if the writers weren’t cowards. A lot gayer, magic users aren’t the enemy in every single episode, and Uther is the actual villain of the story. Morgana is still a villain, but we have sympathy for her.

entry.title: Soldier, Servant, Poet, King
entry.summary:
Author: Grammar_Beane

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,809Chapters: 6/24Kudos: 59

Summary: Arthur and Merlin were just going on a hunting trip. It was meant to be a nice, easy trip through the woods around Camelot. It ended with them being chased by an unknown monster into an unknown cave, stepping out into an unknown world. Maybe the weird bard and the magic monster hunter they found in the woods could help? Jaskier and Geralt were on their way north for the winter—Jaskier to Oxenfurt, Geralt to Kaer Morhen. But they were still a ways away when two odd men claiming to be from a place called “Camelot” stumbled into them. Geralt immediately learned Merlin has magic, and Jaskier could see the chemistry between the pair from a mile away. Arthur wanted to get back to Camelot.Merlin wanted to get back to Camelot, and stay alive while his magic seemed intent on acting bizarre.Geralt wanted to travel with Jaskier.Jaskier wanted to travel with Geralt, and get those two idiots to confess everything. It took some time, but they all got what they wanted. More or less.

entry.title: The Paper King
entry.summary:
Author: HerMajestyofLichtenstein

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,466Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Sequel to The Trial of King Uther Pendragon As Camelot stands on the brink of a new reign, the future has never been more uncertain. After the death of Uther, Arthur is poised to take the throne. However, heavy is the head that wears the crown. With the Council’s ultimatum looming large, his own advisors quietly manoeuvre for power in the shadows. Merlin can no longer hide behind the anonymity of a servant. With his magic exposed, he is thrust into the heart of court politics and responsibility. Protecting Arthur is no longer his only duty, and his people need him more than ever. In a realm on the edge of change, can they find balance in their new roles, or will the weight of the crown and the cost of magic tear Camelot apart?

entry.title: When I'm 6 Feet Under and the Bugs are Eating my Heart, All they will Taste is You
entry.summary:
Author: Ap_1238

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,139Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 20

Summary: This is me simply trying to cope the heartbreak that was the finale of Merlin. I watched this show years ago and was distraught to see an edit pop back up. I'll be real, I cried for 2 days straight----The feeling of grief is hard to define.For Arthur Pendragon it was losing everything he thought he had.If only he could see the gold in the night sky.ORthe eyes of someone he loves.----Post season 5 finale. He's not DEAD.Arthur trying to cope with all the pressure.He has a kingdom to rule, a wife to love.But how can he do that if he can't figure out what is in his own heart.----OK IM MAKING THIS SEEM SO ANGSTYIT'S CUTE AND FUNNY TOO I PROMISE*Note: If you are uncomfortable with the idea of Mpreg please do not fret. I'm trying to make this story so you can feel a resolution without feeling pressured to read the whole. For the rest of the freaks (me too babe) I hope you enjoy this beatiful coping mechanism!

Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 205,583Chapters: 49/58Kudos: 166

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. entry.title: Different Destiny: The Outlaw Prince
entry.summary:
Author: tansyuduri

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,310Chapters: 12/25Kudos: 132

Summary: When Merlin's magic is exposed shortly before season 2 starts, the path of destiny starts changing forever. Now on the run with Arthur, Morgana, and Gwen. Merlin hopes to convince Arthur that magic is totally good instead of him and Morgana just being an exception. Morgana, meanwhile, hopes to convince him to usurp his father. As allies are gathered and Arthur realizes the injustice in his kingdom, it looks more and more like he will have to act in a drastic way. A way he dreads.   Meanwhile, Arthur and Merlin are growing closer and closer and might just have feelings for each other. Something they probably should be better about realizing, considering the example of Gwen and Morgana right next to them.   In a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom now rests on the shoulders of four, their names: Merlin, Arthur, Guinevere, and Morgana

entry.title: Most Opportune Moments
entry.summary:
Author: olivebitter

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,980Chapters: 10/11Kudos: 22

Summary: A foreign dignitary comes to Camelot—and brings the Monster of the Week with him. It’s just a tad unusual that the monster confesses their magic to Arthur the moment they meet and asks for asylum until they can flee the city. Now the Prince’s daily tasks include not only keeping his idiot servant from doing anything too stupid, but also using the little time he has with this newest “friend” to goad a certain somebody into finally confessing his long- (and badly) held secret. Too bad the monster has plans of their own. Their big goal? Getting into Merlin’s bed.The way there? Convoluted.The biggest danger? The fool eloping with the monstrous woman and leaving Arthur behind. Wait—of course that’s not what the Prince would say. Obviously, the real threat is Uther finding out and lighting some fires. May Magic smile upon them.

entry.title: Blue Wizard
entry.summary:
Author: HappyStrykr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,422Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Young Merlin Morgan receives a scholarship to Avalon Academy, and after deferring for a year, finally accepts that he can’t live in the comfort of Michigan forever. Leaving behind almost everything, he enters a world of the rich and famous, bumping elbows with the very elite of America. Just attending such a prestigious school means he will be set for life. Now if he could just stop pissing off his blonde bombshell of a next door neighbor.

entry.title: Building lives after death
entry.summary:
Author: weepingelm

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,187Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 16

Summary: Arthur Pendragon is the head of an organised Crime syndicate in London, His husband leaves him and disappears because he cannot cope with the life. This is the story of Arthurs fight to find his husband and maybe, just maybe build a new life. Their trails and tribulations on the journey. Will they make it? Where will they go? And who will take over as the new Boss.
